sql

static java.lang.Object sql(java.lang.Object fmpro, java.lang.Object statement, java.lang.Object columnDelimiter, java.lang.Object rowDelimiter)
Execute SQL statement, return result as text.
Parameters:
fmpro - object from ScriptMaster
statement - SQL to execute
columnDelimiter - character to use between field (column) values
rowDelimiter - character to use between records(rows)
Returns:
an abstract number, representing the current time

statement - SQL to execute
Returns:
true on success, otherwise throw Exception
